column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I ca n't believe Miss Queeny Smug Face had them right under our noses the whole time ! "
#Text=Tenzin says : " We have to get into that compound tonight and get those airbenders out . "
#Text=Bumi says : " All right .
#Text=" Korra says : " Everyone , act natural .
#Text=And Bolin - " Bolin says : " I 'm on it !
#Text=What ?
#Text=Hey , I 'm not sweaty this time !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Lin ?
#Text=What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Lin says : " We need to get Korra out of here immediately .
#Text=Her life 's in danger .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?!
#Text=What 's going on ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I just got word from Lord Zuko and Tonraq .
#Text=" Korra says : " Why is Lord Zuko with my dad ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Zaheer and the others have escaped .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " How is that possible ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Because Zaheer is an airbender now .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No ... " Korra says : " All right , hold on !
#Text=Will you quit ignoring me and tell me what 's going on ?
#Text=Who 's Zaheer ?
#Text=Why is my life in danger ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Shortly after we found out you were the Avatar , Zaheer and three others attempted to kidnap you .
#Text=Luckily , your father , Lord Zuko , Chief Sokka and I were there to stop them .
#Text=We apprehended the criminals and locked them away in prisons designed to impair their abilities .
#Text=" Korra says : " So that 's why you and my dad sheltered me away .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It was for your own safety .
#Text=" Mako says : " Why were they trying to kidnap Korra ?
#Text=" Lin says : " We spent thirteen years interrogating them , but they never broke .
#Text=To this day , no one knows what their motive was .
#Text=Now we need to get you back to Republic City , where I can protect you .
#Text=" Korra says : " No ... I 'm not running .
#Text=" Lin says : " Korra , you do n't understand .
#Text=These criminals are like nothing you 've ever faced before .
#Text=" Korra says : " Look , I 'm not a little kid anymore .
#Text=You do n't need to protect me .
#Text=I came here for one thing : to find airbenders .
#Text=And I 'm not leaving without them .
#Text=" Lin says : " Fine .
#Text=Let 's get them and get out of here .
#Text=Where are they ?
#Text=" Korra says : " In a military compound , and we 're busting them out .
#Text="
